title: Bug 122306TOC on group won't be displayed
OB: Bug 122306TOC on group won't be displayed Description:TOC on group won't be displayedSteps to reproduce:1.Add a sample datasource and a data with table "CUSTOMERS"2.Add a table binding with data set3.Add a group on the table and set the toc expression to "Group"4.Preview in HTMLExpected result:TOC "Group" will be displayed on the TOC paneActual result:Nothing in the TOC pane
SR: Description:TOC on group won't be displayedSteps to reproduce:1.Add a sample datasource and a data with table "CUSTOMERS"2.Add a table binding with data set3.Add a group on the table and set the toc expression to "Group"4.Preview in HTMLExpected result:TOC "Group" will be displayed on the TOC paneActual result:Nothing in the TOC pane
